keywords.text: Tomato soup, Tomato Bisque, Tomato & Basil
keywords.textHTML: Tomato soup, Tomato Bisque, Tomato & Basil

preparationInstructions.text:
STOVE:  Pour soup into saucepan. Heat, stirring occasionally.
MICROWAVE: Microwave ovens vary. Time is approximate. Uneven microwave heating may cause popping, movement of the container and/or splattering. 1. Remove and discard plastic cap. Poke several holes in plastic film with fork to vent. 2. Microwave on HIGH 1 1/2 to 2 min. or until hot. 3. Careful, leave in microwave for 1 min. Plastic film and bowl may be hot. Grasp bowl on sides when removing from microwave. Carefully remove plastic film. Stir before serving.
preparationInstructions.textHTML:
STOVE:  Pour soup into saucepan. Heat, stirring occasionally.
MICROWAVE: Microwave ovens vary. Time is approximate. Uneven microwave heating may cause popping, movement of the container and/or splattering. 1. Remove and discard plastic cap. Poke several holes in plastic film with fork to vent. 2. Microwave on HIGH 1 1/2 to 2 min. or until hot. 3. Careful, leave in microwave for 1 min. Plastic film and bowl may be hot. Grasp bowl on sides when removing from microwave. Carefully remove plastic film. Stir before serving.

ingredientStatement.text:
Ingredients: Tomato Puree (Water, Tomato Paste), Cream, Diced Tomatoes In Tomato Juice, Sugar, Skim Milk, Modified Food Starch, Contains Less Than 2% Of: Butter (Cream), Cream*, Salt, Wheat Flour, Onions*, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Flavoring, Whey Protein Concentrate, Citric Acid, Basil, Tomatoes*, Spices, Sunflower Lecithin, Sunflower Oil, Yeast Extract.



*Dried.

productText.text: Smooth and rich in tomato flavor with a hint of basil
productText.textHTML: Smooth and rich in tomato flavor with a hint of basil

productText.text: Available in easy-to-open, microwave-safe bowls that are perfect for work, school, or on the go
productText.textHTML: Available in easy-to-open, microwave-safe bowls that are perfect for work, school, or on the go

productText.text:
Made With Patience, Not Preservatives.® 
Everything good takes time. Our Slow Kettle® Style line has high-quality ingredients and delicious flavor combinations that deliver an experience that you will want to slow down and savor.
productText.textHTML:
Made With Patience, Not Preservatives.® 
Everything good takes time. Our Slow Kettle® Style line has high-quality ingredients and delicious flavor combinations that deliver an experience that you will want to slow down and savor.

productText.text: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Tomato & Sweet Basil Bisque is smooth and rich in flavor of tomato and a hint of sweet basil.
productText.textHTML: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Tomato & Sweet Basil Bisque is smooth and rich in flavor of tomato and a hint of sweet basil.

productText.text: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Tomato & Sweet Basil Bisque is smooth and rich in flavor of tomato and a hint of sweet basil.  The restaurant-quality taste will make you want slow down and savor each and every spoonful.
productText.textHTML: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Tomato & Sweet Basil Bisque is smooth and rich in flavor of tomato and a hint of sweet basil.  The restaurant-quality taste will make you want slow down and savor each and every spoonful.

productText.text: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style soups are carefully crafted by our chefs. Made With Patience, Not Preservatives.® We simmer the perfect combination of authentic ingredients with indulgent tastes to create a mix of unique flavors that are inspired by the art of cooking. You’ll want to savor every spoonful of these restaurant-quality soups in the comfort of your own home. ​Slow Kettle®​ ​ Style soups are worth slowing down for.
